headline: DeSantis says 'Cold War' could ensue between Florida and Georgia if Stacey Abrams wins governor race
author: Hannah Getahun
sentences: During a press conference Friday in Gulf County, Florida, while promoting a workforce development event, DeSantis spoke about the race in Georgia, seemingly encouraging Georgia residents to make sure they cost Abrams the election.
"I can't have Castro to my south and Abrams to my north, that would be a disaster," he said, adding: "So I hope you guys take care of that and we'll end up in good shape."

"If Stacey Abrams is elected governor of Georgia, I just want to be honest, that will be a cold war between Florida and Georgia," he said.
Florida Governor Ron DeSantis said that a southern "cold war" could happen if Stacey Abrams wins Georgia's governor's race in November.
